info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:22PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Douglas, southwestern Arapahoe and east central Jefferson Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 921 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chatfield Reservoir, or 12 miles southwest of Denver, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Aurora, Centennial, Highlands Ranch, Littleton, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree and Chatfield Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
